column5: I hope this link works it is an amazing video, don't know how they manged to film it  http://www.flixxy.com/bear-animal-nature-film.htm?r=0  if it doesn't work try typing it in , well worth the watch
Uh, you know that's fake right?  Fake as in all trained animals
As in a Hollywood type movie directed by a French director.  It is a very good movie though.  I still want to go kick the trappers   !!!!!

They managed to film it with 3 trainers, 3 trained animals, a director, producer, 5 person camera crew... pretty sweet video though, I like the part at the end with the little one growling ( or roaring ? ) and the big bear behind it.
